text: 2068 (MMLXVIII) will be . == Events == * January 1 â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1972 will enter the public domain in the United States. * 2068 Summer Olympics will be held. * A time capsule at the Helium Centennial Time Columns Monument will be reopened, 100 years after it was locked. * Asteroid 99942 Apophis has a tiny chance of hitting Earth on April 12, 2068.
